Summary: Blinking light hovering and moving over Halifax.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Halifax
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at work a little bit early just sitting outside waiting for everyone else. Out of the corner of my eye I saw this red-ish colored small ball like shape blinking. At first you could just see it hovering between the trees and blinking. Then I noticed that it was moving away from where it was hovering at but very incredibly slowly. Almost as if it would go and then stop briefly before moving on. It continued to do this until it was either no longer in my sight or just gone. This object was flying way to low and way to slow for it to have been any type of a plane.
